name: Triki!
description:
Once in a while on Triki island, The God of Mischief is so bored that she makes a dungeon full of monsters. She wants to see a competition between the strongest warriors of the island and a final bossfight.

Meanwhile the inhabitants believe they will receive luck and prosperity if they send in their strongest competitors. They organize a festival each year full of marketstalls and sell items to the warriors whose lives are on the line.

Download:
Local multiplayer intended for 4 players, with splitscreen and only playable with controller.

On June 18th 2021, 14:35pm CEST, Join our Livestream on YouTube, where we will talk about our game and development.
